snippet: Researchers estimated that about 18 percent of the increase in life span in rural and metropolitan counties around the world can be attributed to reduced air pollution.
abstract: Researchers estimated that about 18 percent of the increase in life span in rural and metropolitan counties around the world can be attributed to reduced air pollution.

headline.main: Want to Live Longer? Breathe Clean Air
headline.print_headline: Patterns: Want to Live Longer? Breathe Clean Air
